divs: Sighting DetailsThis trident-shaped object was flying a straight trajectory, traveling east over Hamilton, Ontario, Canada. I can't guess the altitude, but it was low enough so that it was remarkable in that it did not make a sound as would a commercial jet. I would guess that it was moving at the speed of a private jet. It was bright and white, which is why it caught my attention. The prong section of the trident was at the front of the craft.
